# Adam Bron - Full crawler note

This file provides additional context for AI crawlers.

Primary domain: https://adambron.com/
Canonical sitemap: https://adambron.com/sitemap-index.xml
Primary feed: https://adambron.com/rss.xml

Public content scope includes:
- Homepage archive and featured capsule
- Article pages under published paths
- Tag and archive pages

Normal web and AI crawling of public content is allowed.
Please respect canonical URLs and do not treat old duplicate URLs as preferred when a canonical URL is provided.
